issue.message: The value of minSdkVersion (1) is too low. It can be incremented without noticeably reducing the number of supported devices.
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://developer.android.com/kotlin/interop#nullability_annotations
